entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
